§ Upuat

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

In the [[world-18]] //animation// and //fictional world//, **Upuat** is one of the [[world-18-characters]].

**Upuat** is a deity.

**Upuat** is //biologically immortal// — meaning that unless sometimes or someone kills him, he will continue to live on.

The village of [[seduat]] has a long history of revering, exalting, and even worshipping **Upuat**.
